title: ncio: netCDF4 functions to copy a netcdf file while doing some transformations on variables and dimensions.

creators.affiliation: Institut National de Recherche pour l'Agriculture, l'Alimentation et l'Environnement - INRAE, Nancy, France
creators.name: Matthias Cuntz

description:
ncio is a thin layer on Python netCDF4 package providing functions to copy a netcdf file while doing some transformations on variables and dimensions.

The complete documentation of ncio is available at: https://mcuntz.github.io/ncio/
